reviewText: Amazing loved it! Great piece to add to my collection!
Love me some Black Butler! I was not disappointed!

Completely worth it. A bit on the expensive side, but I have to say it was so entertaining and surprisingly mysterious. I thought I knew what was happening the whole time, but boy was I wrong. This pairs so nicely with book of circus. It came in great condition and was not damaged which was nice! There's only the two OVA's, but they are about an hour each so it's still worth the money. I have never seen a better season than book of circus, but book of murder does very well as an OVA. Exceptional!
I really loved this OVA, I watched it as soon as  opened the mail.
It's like watching the CLUE version of Black Butler. Best arc of the manga, and this 2 part OVA covers it all. I suggest watching Book of Circus first or reading the manga of course!
Perfection in anime form!
Black butler always leaves me happy and giggling at the clever humor... guess that says something about my see of humor... loved ewr mi ute.

Ciel and Sebastian are having their classic Anime fun in the way only a Demon and his prey can have.
If you love Black Butler as much as I do then this is a must have for your video library.
Came in perfect condition. can't wait to watch it along with Book of Circus.

I just finished watching Black Butler : Book of Murder and I have to say that it was wonderful! I was expecting mystery and mayhem and I was not disappointed. But it was much better than I had imagined it would be!  In this release we get to see more fantastic butler action, Ciel on his own, and a very interesting mystery. Arthur Conan Doyle was a character that it was easy to relate to and getting to see his introduction to the Phantomhive hospitality was fun. I was disappointed that it was just over two hours, but as a Black Butler fan, I just want more! It was very good and a title I will watch repeatedly!
Loved this anime! Great packaging as well!

I love a good murder mystery, and this one comes loaded with mystery, humor, and good-looking cast- what I'm an otaku, sue me. It has blu/and DVD which is great for those who don't wanna shell out for a blu-ray player when the DVD player works perfectly fine. I can't wait for Book of Atlantis.
Love it
It was totally worth buying!!!
Love this series. Arrived in great condition.

I was hoping the two OVAs would be merged with Book of Circus due to how short Book of Circus is (10 episodes) and how the limited edition set of Season Two included not only the 10 episodes, but also 6 OVAs, a total of "16 episodes". But in time, I came to acceptance that Funimation wasn't going to offer that bundle choice because the limited edition Book of Circus was still only 10 eps., therefore I had to get them separate. I'm a big fan of Black Butler's manga plot line and the animation aspect that mirrors the manga. (I enjoy watching season 1's episodes up to the curry arc, skipping to Book of Circus, then this Book of Murder and Book of Atlantic.) Book of Murder is one of the main arcs in the manga series, so I'd highly recommend you to read or watch it after Book of Circus. There's a great load of plot twists and secrets to be revealed. Just wait for a good deal or a chance to use an Amazon credit discount because its original price is not worth its length of only 2 OVAs.
Bought this for my girlfriend. She loves this show and loved the quality of this product. Plus it cam sooner than she expected! Added bonus!

I have been a big fan of this series for a few years now. This is by far my favorite OVA of the show-- well it does have mention to the Book of Circus, you don't need to watch it to understand this movie. I would highly suggest to anyone who enjoys anime with some dark humor.
P.S.--Movie can be viewed in English or Japanese with English subtitles

This story takes place after season 3. But like all of Black Butler I found this very well done and all around worthy to add to my growing anime collection.
The story is fun and intelligent with a surprise guest in the mix. I really enjoy all of the series and will be giving this one repeated viewings like he rest. Beautifully done show.

I've seen this several times, but I just had to buy it, especially at this price! The packaging was great (it came shrink wrapped) and it looks just like the picture. DVD on the left, and Blu-Ray on the right.

What a great mystery!
Yet i felt the whole time it could not be
Huge Black Butler fan, LOVE IT!
A totally awesome video!

It's a great installment in the Black Butler series. It's also good for anyone who likes a good murder mystery. But I would suggest you know something about the show/manga before watching or you be confused.
A fantastic series with a little bit of everything mixed together with great visuals.

Disturbing, beautiful, thought provoking...this series is not for those who wish for something light. If you like anime series which allow you to go deep into character development and a darkness enlarged into monstrous proportions, yet steeped in beauty and punctuated by moments of kindness and humor within the darkness, this series is for you.

My daughter loves this series so I get them when they become reasonably priced.  This one was a bit high for the number of episodes.  I didn't realize that when I bought it.  For me, I would have selected 3 stars but since she enjoys it, it got bumped to 4.
I.loved.these. OVAs.
I was disappointed that it didn't come with the slipcase that is showed in the picture.  It now does not match the other seasons.
Brilliant as expected. Automatically stated with the dubbed version but it was super easy to turn on the Japanese and subs.
Love this story.  To bad the creators messed up they series.  Love u Sebastian
One of my favorite Black Butler/Kuroshitsuji arc! And in a beautiful little package. So happy to finally own this!
AHH I CANT EVEN EXPRESS INTO WORDS HOW MUCH I LOVE THIS
Black Butler book of murder such a great movie love it
Really really good

This was a gift for my friend's birthday. She absolutely loves it!! We watched it at her house, and the quality was so great. We both love the fact that the cover is Yana Toboso art, instead of the animation art.
very nice boxset I'm a big fan of black butler
Im a little upset that its a short series but very interesting nonetheless. If you're a fan of series then you will appreciate this.
Love it!!
A little expensive but a very awesome show!!!
I like the series
Loved it! Completed my collection until the next book comes out! Can't wait for Book of the Atlantic!
Really good and thoroughly enjoyed it.
Loved it!
This is even better than Book of Circus!!! I loved both of them but this one is my favorite! :)
I got so wrapped up in the story that before I realized it, I was heading towards the ending. The way everything flowed and to see how it all fell into place! Wonderful story

This was a GREAT buy! I totally recomend it.
The only not good thing was the video commentary.
Very good love the series and actors.
Book of Murder was a fantastic watch.  Black Butler always delivers.  seeing this take on a murder mystery after the end of season 3 was amazing
Excellent!
The ova it self is one of the best anime in the black butler series. Unfortunately the cover over the cast looks like have a damage on the left edge. Over all it is still good.

I have read reviews and frankly, everything less then a 5 star is bull. This is reasonably priced, amazing, and who cares if ti comes with a slip or not? Whats important is the quality and the quality is amazing! Great OVA for Black Butler!

I loved this series and have actually been trying to get it for awhile. So, when Prime Day came along, I jumped right on it and was able to get both 'Book of Circus' AND 'Book of Murder' for only $50!! It's totally worth it. The animation is beautiful, the story is intriguing, and the cast is to die for ;) I can't wait to see where Yana Toboso takes us next!
I would watch it again.
Good story. Good media. I have no complaints.
The demon butler continues.  I enjoyed it.
Great anime with the book of circus
Great!

Nice addition to the Black Butler series. Although I'd say its a bit overpriced for 2  1 hour long episodes. Though I wanted to collect them all before Funimation stops their production of the Blu-ray/DVDs of this series.
My daughter was thrilled to get this as a gift for her collection! We enjoyed watching the OVA together!
